description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Camille Fournier - Head of engineering at Rent the Runway

ABSTRACT
Building great teams isn't just something that managers do alone, with spreadsheets and workflows and process documents. Great teams come from the participation of the group to push the team there. In this talk we will talk about how you can think about your role in creating a high-performance team, whatever your job title. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7756

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
